ovdesc.p: This file holds the instructions for formatting the signature display screen. In addition it holds the list of valid card mandate conditions along with the terminals supported for capture and display of signatures.
There is only one record called "SYSTEM" and this will be entered automatically when any function is entered within the application.

Also defined are the signature boxes available on each signature card. Any number may be defined dependant simply on how many may visibly be displayed on the screen. Each signature box may be labelled uniquely and positioned anywhere on the screen. Each box may also have it's area defined with a drawn around rectangle.
Lines of text may be entered for display on each signature card. Any number may be entered and displayed anywhere on the available area of the screen.

Defines the names of those applications which may request the display of a signature.

Any T24 application containing an account number may request display of a signature providing the application is defined in this field and the location of the account number field given in the next field DISPLAY.FIELD.
Once this is entered the signature for an account may be requested with the signature hotkey when operating within the application concerned.
1 - 35 alphanumeric. Begins the multivalue set of fields 15 and 16.
Application must exist on the PGM.FILE table.
Defines whether the signature display system is enabled to the tellers.

Input must be either "Y" or "N". When changing from "Y" to "N" an override is required since this will close down signature display to any calling application. This override is written to the exception log file for reporting at end of day. The user is warned about this on-line when a shutdown is requested.

Defines whether any name saved with a signature is to displayed on the label line of the signature box.

When signatures are captured or at a later stage if required a name may be added for each signature box. If this field is set to 'Y' for any signature box then the name if it exists will be appended to the actual signature box label and displayed at the screen position defined in LABEL.POSN. This field is multivalue associated with SIGNATURE.BOX. The default setting is 'N'.

Defines the location of the account number field in an application requesting a signature display.

Any T24 application may request the display of a signature providing the application is defined in the previous field DISPLAY.APPL and the location of the account number field within the application is entered in this field.

The other input option is 'C' which means that the location of the account number field may vary within records of the application and must therefore be calculated by the application itself. An example of this is TELLER where the debit account number must be determined from the two possible sides of the transaction before the signature can be requested.
